roleset.name: worthy of wanting

example.name: arg1
example.text: I can understand the argument that nuclear proliferation is bad and any of these states having nuclear weapons is not desirable as it just leads to proliferation in the region , but that argument should have been used against Pakistan and Israel getting nukes .
example.arg: any of these states having nuclear weapons
as it just leads to proliferation in the region

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, desire-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls want-32.1-1-1.
